cards.name: 蓝色中队护航队员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>英康公司设计的T-65X翼战机一跃成为整个星系最高效、用途多样的交通工具，为反抗军同盟大大地提供了便利。</flavor>

cards.name: •诺拉·维库斯里
cards.subtitle: 金色9号
cards.ability_text: 当你进行防御时，如果在你距离0~1内有敌机，则本次掷骰结果增加1<evade>。

cards.name: Green Squadron Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Due to its sensitive controls and high maneuverability, only the most talented pilots belong in an A-wing cockpit.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Vectored Thrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Edrio Two Tubes
cards.subtitle: Cavern Angels Veteran
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

cards.name: 红色中队资深飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>作为一支精英战斗机中队，红色中队有着反抗军同盟中最优秀的飞行员。</flavor>

cards.name: •Braylen Stramm
cards.subtitle: Blade Leader
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

cards.name: •赛恩·奇列尔
cards.subtitle: 科罗那4号
cards.ability_text: 当你执行一次攻击时，你可以花费掷骰结果中的1<focus>、1<hit>或1<crit>，以此来查看防御方面朝下的伤害卡，选择其中1张并使其暴露。

cards.name: •加里文·德赖斯
cards.subtitle: 红色领队
cards.ability_text: 在你花费1枚专注标记后，你可以选择1架距离为1~3的友方战机。该战机获得1枚专注标记。

cards.name: •杰克·波金斯
cards.subtitle: 红色6号
cards.ability_text: 你获得1枚压力标记时，你可以投掷1个攻击骰来移除该标记。如果掷骰结果为<hit>，你承受1<hit>伤害。

cards.name: •Leevan Tenza
cards.subtitle: Rebel Alliance Defector
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, you may perform a red <evade> action.

cards.name: •“荷兰”·范德
cards.subtitle: 金色领队
cards.ability_text: 在你执行<targetlock>行动后，你可以选择1架距离为1~3的友方战机。该战机可以对你已锁定的目标进行一次锁定，无视距离限制。

cards.name: •Ezra Bridger
cards.subtitle: Spectre-6
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to change up to 2 of your <focus> results to <evade> /<hit> results. </smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Comms Shuttle:</sabold> While you are docked, your carrier ship gains <coordinate>. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a <coordinate> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •“Zeb” Orrelios
cards.subtitle: Spectre-4
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you defend, <crit> results are neutralized before <hit> results.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Comms Shuttle:</sabold> While you are docked, your carrier ship gains <coordinate>. Before your carrier ship activates, it may perform a <coordinate> action.</shipability>

cards.name: Phoenix Squadron Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Led by Commander Jun Sato, the brave but inexperienced pilots of Phoenix Squadron face staggering odds in their battle against the Galactic Empire.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Vectored Thrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Ten Numb
cards.subtitle: Blue Five
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your <focus> results to <evade> or <hit> results.

cards.name: Blade Squadron Veteran
cards.ability_text: <flavor>A unique gyrostabilization system surrounds the B-wing’s cockpit, ensuring that the pilot always remains stationary during flight.</flavor>

cards.name: Blue Squadron Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Due to its heavy weapons array and resilient shielding, the B-wing has solidified itself as the Rebel Alliance’s most innovative assault fighter.</flavor>

cards.name: •霍顿·索姆
cards.subtitle: 灰色领队
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击时，每有一架其他友方战机与防御方距离为0~1，你可以重投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: •伊凡·韦尔兰
cards.subtitle: 金色3号
cards.ability_text: 在交战阶段开始时，你可以花费1枚专注标记来选择一架与你距离为0~1的友方战机。如果你如此做，该战机进行防御时额外投1个防御骰，直到本轮结束。

cards.name: 金色中队资深飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>由乔安·“荷兰”·范德指挥的金色中队在斯卡利夫与雅文两次战争中扮演了重要的角色。</flavor>

cards.name: 灰色中队投弹手
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Y翼战机被银河帝国逐步淘汰之后，其耐用性、可靠性、以及其配备的重型武器，使得其仍作为主力战机服役于反抗军舰队中。</flavor>

cards.name: •Jake Farrell
cards.subtitle: Sage Instructor
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0–1. That ship may perform a <focus> action.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Vectored Thrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Arvel Crynyd
cards.subtitle: Green Leader
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You can perform primary attacks at range 0.<return>If you would fail a <boost> action by overlapping another ship, resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Vectored Thrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Han Solo
cards.subtitle: Scoundrel for Hire
cards.ability_text: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0–1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

cards.name: •Lando Calrissian
cards.subtitle: General of the Alliance
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0–3. That ship may perform an action.

cards.name: •Chewbacca
cards.subtitle: The Mighty
cards.ability_text: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to be dealt the card facedown instead.

cards.name: •Hera Syndulla
cards.subtitle: Spectre-2
cards.ability_text: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.<return><shipability><sabold>Tail Gun:</sabold> While you have a docked ship, you have a primary <reararc> weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship’s primary <frontarc> attack value.</shipability>

cards.name: •Kanan Jarrus
cards.subtitle: Spectre-1
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship in your firing arc defends, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.<return><shipability><sabold>Tail Gun:</sabold> While you have a docked ship, you have a primary <reararc> weapon with an attack value equal to your docked ship’s primary <frontarc> attack value.</shipability>

cards.name: •“重击兵”米泽尔
cards.subtitle: 黑色2号
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击距离为1的攻击时，额外投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: •“灾祸”斯库图
cards.subtitle: 熟练老兵
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击，且防御方位于你的<bullseye>时，额外投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: •伊达·瓦西奥
cards.subtitle: 地狱领队
cards.ability_text: 在一架距离0~1的友方TIE/ln 战斗机将遭受1点或更多的伤害之前，你可以花费1<standardcharge>。如果你如此做，阻止该伤害。

cards.name: •基德昂·哈斯克
cards.subtitle: 地狱2号
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击，且防御方已受伤时，额外投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: •戴·米克
cards.subtitle: 地狱3号
cards.ability_text: 当一架与你距离0~2的友方战机正进行防御，且攻击方已受伤时，该友方战机可以重投1个防御骰。

cards.name: •赛因·玛拉那
cards.subtitle: 地狱4号
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击时，你可以花费掷骰结果中的1<crit>。如果你如此做，防御方拿取1张面朝下的伤害卡，然后取消你剩余的掷骰结果。

cards.name: 黑色中队王牌飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>黑色中队的精英TIE/ln战斗机飞行员，在雅文战役中跟随达斯·维德进行作战，给予反抗军势力毁灭性打击。</flavor>

cards.name: 帝国军校飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>银河帝国委托西纳舰队系统公司制造的TIE/In战机，与其主要的星际战斗机一样，飞行速度快且十分敏捷，投入生产的战机数量多得令人咋舌。</flavor>

cards.name: •达斯·维德
cards.subtitle: 黑色领队
cards.ability_text: 当你执行行动后，你可以花费1<forcecharge>来再执行一个行动。 <return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: •马雷克·斯泰勒
cards.subtitle: 银河帝国的仆从
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击，且防御方将拿取一张面朝上的伤害卡时，改为拿取3张伤害卡，选择其中1张交给防御方并弃掉余下两张。  <return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: •维德·弗斯洛
cards.subtitle: 野心勃勃的工程师
cards.ability_text: 当你执行移动时，你可以改为执行方向与难度相同，而速度上升/下降一级的移动。<return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: •泽提克·斯特罗姆
cards.subtitle: 铁面管理员
cards.ability_text: 在结束阶段，你可以花费1枚你放置在敌机上的锁定标记，以此来暴露1张该战机的伤害卡。<return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: 暴风中队王牌飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>TIE高级X1战斗机并未大规模生产，但其设计团队均为西纳舰队系统公司最优秀的工程师，确保这架战机有着最顶尖的质量，接近TIE系列下一代机型：TIE拦截机。 </flavor><return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: 狂雨中队飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>本TIE高级机型沿用了时下最流行的TIE/ln的设计，在其基础上增加了护盾、更好的武器、操作系统、曲面太阳能电池板、以及超空间驱进器。 </flavor><return><shipability>高级定位计算机：当你进行基础攻击且防御方已被你锁定时，多投1个攻击骰并将1<hit>变为1<crit>。</shipability>

cards.name: •Seventh Sister
cards.subtitle: Sadistic Interrogator
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 2<nonbreak><forcecharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

cards.name: Baron of the Empire
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Sienar Fleet System’s TIE Advanced v1 is a groundbreaking starfighter design, featuring upgraded engines, a missile launcher, and folding s-foils.</flavor>

cards.name: •Turr Phennir
cards.subtitle: Ambitious Ace
cards.ability_text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action, even if you are stressed.<return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: Saber Squadron Ace
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Led by Baron Soontir Fel, the pilots of Saber Squadron are among the Empire’s best. Their TIE interceptors are marked with red stripes to designate pilots with at least ten confirmed kills. </flavor> <return> <shipability> <sabold> Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: Alpha Squadron Pilot
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Sienar Fleet Systems designed the TIE interceptor with four wing-mounted laser cannons, a dramatic increase in firepower over its predecessors.</flavor><return><shipability><sabold>Autothrusters:</sabold> After you perform an action, you may perform a red <barrelroll> or red <boost> action.</shipability>

cards.name: •Major Vermeil
cards.subtitle: Veteran of Scarif
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or <focus> results to a <hit> result.</smallbody><return> <return><shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: •Captain Feroph
cards.subtitle: Imperial Courier

cards.name: •“Vizier”
cards.subtitle: Ruthless Tactician
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>After you fully execute a speed 1 maneuver using your <smallcaps>Adaptive Ailerons</smallcaps> ship ability, you may perform a <coordinate> action. cards.name: •“Duchess”
cards.subtitle: Urbane Ace
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>You may choose not to use your <sabold>Adaptive Ailerons</sabold>. <return>You may use your <sabold>Adaptive Ailerons</sabold> even while stressed.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: •“Countdown”
cards.subtitle: Death Defier
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: •“Pure Sabacc”
cards.subtitle: Confident Gambler
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>While you perform an attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.</smallbody><return><shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: Black Squadron Scout
cards.ability_text: <flavor>These heavily armed atmospheric craft employ their specialized moveable wings to gain additional speed and maneuverability.</flavor><return> <shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: Planetary Sentinel
cards.ability_text: <flavor>To protect its many military installations, the Empire requires a swift and vigilant defense force.</flavor><return> <shipability><sabold>Adaptive Ailerons:</sabold> Before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you <bold>must</bold> execute a white [1<nonbreak><leftbank>], [1<nonbreak><straight>], or [1<nonbreak><rightbank>] maneuver.</shipability>

cards.name: •波巴·费特
cards.subtitle: 臭名昭著的赏金猎人
cards.ability_text: 当你进行防御或执行攻击时，在你距离0~1内每有一架敌机，你可以重投1个骰子。

cards.name: •埃蒙·阿扎明
cards.subtitle: 船运大亨
cards.ability_text: 当你将使用[1<straight>]移动条投下器械时，你可以改为使用[3<leftturn>]、[3<straight>]或[3<rightturn>]移动条。

cards.name: •凯丝·斯卡莱特
cards.subtitle: 拜内耶海盗团舰长
cards.ability_text: 当你执行基础攻击时，如果有至少一架无限制的友方战机与防御方距离为0，则你额外投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: •柯沙卡·弗罗斯特
cards.subtitle: 不近人情的专家
cards.ability_text: 当你进行攻击或防御时，如果该敌机处于压力状态，你可以重投1个骰子。

cards.name: •卡朗西斯·崔里斯
cards.subtitle: 帝国军逃兵
cards.ability_text: 你可以从你的<reararc>执行<frontarc>特殊攻击。 <return>当你执行特殊攻击时，你可以重投1个攻击骰。

cards.name: 赏金猎人
cards.ability_text: <flavor>喷火型巡逻飞行器就是罪恶的标志，它的出现代表夺命赏金杀手们将要登场，比如姜戈·费特与波巴·费特，他们会在自己的飞船上塞满数不尽的致命性武器。</flavor>

cards.name: •芬恩·劳
cards.subtitle: 骷髅领队
cards.ability_text: 当你进行防御或执行攻击时，如果本次攻击距离为1，你可以投1个额外的骰子。  <return><shipability>康考迪亚对峙：当你进行防御时，如果本次攻击距离为1，且你位于攻击方的<frontarc>内，将任意1个掷骰结果变为1<evade>。</shipability>

cards.name: •乔伊·瑞科夫
cards.subtitle: 骷髅中队王牌飞行员
cards.ability_text: 当你执行攻击时，你可以从已装备的<torpedo>升级卡上花费1<standardcharge>，如果你如此做，防御方少投1个防御骰。 <return><shipability>康考迪亚对峙：当你进行防御时，如果本次攻击距离为1，且你位于攻击方的<frontarc>内，将任意1个掷骰结果变为1<evade>。</shipability>

cards.name: •科安达·索吕
cards.subtitle: 熟练的突击队员
cards.ability_text: 你完全地执行红色移动后，获得2枚专注标记。  <return><shipability>康考迪亚对峙：当你进行防御时，如果本次攻击距离为1，且你位于攻击方的<frontarc>内，将任意1个掷骰结果变为1<evade>。</shipability>

cards.name: 骷髅中队飞行员
cards.ability_text: <flavor>骷髅中队的王牌飞行员倾向于采用侵略性战术，精通操纵机翼枢轴的技巧，使得机体的敏捷性能无与伦比，连猎物也为之叹服。 </flavor><return><shipability>康考迪亚对峙：当你进行防御时，如果本次攻击距离为1，且你位于攻击方的<frontarc>内，将任意1个掷骰结果变为1<evade>。</shipability>

cards.name: 狂热的新兵
cards.ability_text: <flavor>曼达洛的獠牙战斗机飞行员必须掌握康考迪亚对峙，借助自身机体精准的攻击模式，执行正面死亡冲锋。</flavor><return><shipability>康考迪亚对峙：当你进行防御时，如果本次攻击距离为1，且你位于攻击方的<frontarc>内，将任意1个掷骰结果变为1<evade>。</shipability>

cards.name: •N’dru Suhlak
cards.subtitle: Hunt Saboteur
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, roll 1 additional attack die.

cards.name: •Kaa’to Leeachos
cards.subtitle: Imposing Marauder
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0–2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

cards.name: •<italic>Nashtah Pup</italic>
cards.subtitle: Contingency Plan
cards.ability_text: You can deploy only via emergency deployment, and you have the name, initiative, pilot ability, and ship <standardcharge> of the friendly, destroyed <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>.<return><shipability><sabold>Escape Craft:</sabold> <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps>Requires the <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>. You <bold>must</bold> begin the game docked with the <smallcaps>Hound’s Tooth</smallcaps>.</shipability>

cards.name: Black Sun Soldier
cards.ability_text: <flavor>The vast and influential Black Sun crime syndicate can always find a use for talented pilots, provided they aren’t particular about how they earn their credits.</flavor>

cards.name: •Serissu
cards.subtitle: Flight Instructor
cards.ability_text: While a friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.<return><shipability><sabold>Weapon Hardpoint:</sabold> You can equip 1 <cannon>, <torpedo>, or <missile> upgrade.</shipability>

cards.name: •Genesis Red
cards.subtitle: Tansarii Point Crime Lord
